name: digitalis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a drug obtained from the foxglove plant (= a flowering plant) that is used to treat heart conditions: The foxglove gave us the valuable heart stimulant digitalis.
More examplesFewer examplesDigitalis is a drug made from dried leaves of the purple foxglove plant.Digitalis has a narrow margin for error, so cardiologists may try to use other treatments for heart-rhythm problems.They put me on digitalis for about a year. I had to take two drops a day.Atrial fibrillation can be treated with medication such as digitalis.
